content: *this attractive little basket-style crocheted tote features a lion suede bottom and a fancy fur trim around the top lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 50139 skill level beginner + level 2 lion® suede article #210 *discontinued* a 244 yards b 122 yards plus fancy fur article #220 *discontinued* c 39 yards crochet hook - size i-9 *free registration at site required to access pattern *
